sections.name: Description
sections.html: These wizards are steeped in the evil of their profession.

tactics.name: Before Combat
tactics.text: The wizard casts false life, mage armor, mind blank, resist energy (fire), see invisibility, and spell turning.

tactics.name: During Combat
tactics.text: The wizard casts time stop and energy drain on the most dangerous-looking target, then thins out the ranks of his enemies with chain lightning.

tactics.name: Base Statistics
tactics.text: Without false life, mage armor, mind blank, resist energy (fire), see invisibility, and spell turning, the wizard’s statistics are AC 19, touch 16, flat-footed 18; hp 155; Fort +14, Ref +11, Will +17; Defensive Abilities none; Resist cold 20.
